dD.text: Checks if a variable changes from when the program starts, a good indicator that it is unused.

b^.text: Sets x_letter to 2nd value of each map point

b|.text: Sets x_letter to 2nd value of each map point

aL.text:
This code changed the map point format from:
<name>
<details> (blank for now)
<x>
<y>
To:
<name>
<details> (blank for now)
<xy>
